actions.recommendation: Blood pressure is high. This is diagnostic of hypertension. Treatment is necessary.
BMI at 31.2 & waist-to-height ratio at 60 are high. This increases the risk of illnesses such as diabetes & hypertension. Keep BMI between 18.5- 24.9 & waist-to-height ratio below 50.
-Be cautious of urinary symptoms such as straining, frequent urination, a weak stream and dribbling. These should always be attended to if they occur.
-Improving your physical activity & diet will help lower your risk of disease & improve control of your blood pressure & sugar levels.
-Please repeat these blood tests: kidney function, glucose, insulin & DHEAS.
